ygData.subject: Re: RE: Symbol of Trans
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think you re missing the point here - the improvement of Symbols isn t that they REPLACE  but that they *stack* on top.  When I
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 21 Jul 1999 elerion@... wrote:

> From: elerion@...
>
> Glad someone else mentioned it, when i made 14 bought my spells, and didnt
> know if any components were needed. But, since i just did a stint in the
> pixies/fairies had a bunch of gems on me. Spell went off but at lev-14
> didnt see any great improvements from center +holy armor, especially since
> the gem cost about 3g+.

I think you're missing the point here - the "improvement" of Symbols
isn't that they REPLACE <HP/AC Buff + AC Buff> but that they *stack* on
top. When I have Bravery, Spirit Armor, Symbol of Ryltan, and Guard on
me, I'm able to do some good second-line tanking easily, without
worries.

--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind
us, with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
